comments.en:
Output from the BJC-600 driver is reported to be fairly good.

One Red Hat 5.1 user reports that he had to comment out "COLOR=-dBitsPerPixel=1" in the /var/spool/lpd/lp/postscript.cfg for the printtool queue to produce decent output.

Commenting out "COLOR=-dBitsPerPixel=8" from /var/spool/lpd/lp/postscript.cfg seems to improve b/w printing for RedHat 6.0.
This printer is apparently slower than the venerable BJC-4x00 series devices?

Consumables/Refills: BC20 $36.99 BC-21e $52.99 BCI-21Bk $8.99 BCI-21Clr $21.99
